document.text:
From: "I 
To: "Zaveri, Mihir"  
Cc: 
Subject: Re: NYT inquiry: Jeffrey Epstein injured in jail? 
Date: Thu, 25 Jul 2019 06:00:50 +0000 
Mihir, we can't confirm and have no comment. 
On Jul 24, 2019, at 11:03 PM, Zaveri, Mihir < 
> 
wrote: 
Hello, this is Mihir Zaveri, reporter at The New York Times. 
We are seeing reports that Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his jail cell after a possible suicide attempt or 
some sort of assault: https://www.nbcnewyork.cominewillocal/Jeffrey-Epstein-Found-Injured-in-NYC-Jail-
Cell-After-Possible-Suicide-Attempt-or-Assault-Sources-513174311.html 
Hoping tonight to confirm this or get any insight into what might have actually happened and where he is right 
now. 
I can be reached at 
Mihir 
EFTA00022538
